data.news_body: Anthem Biosciences Ltdhas informed BSE that the meeting of the Board of Directors of the Company is scheduled on 05/02/2026 inter alia to consider and approve This is to inform you that pursuant to Regulation 29 of Securities and Exchange Board of India (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations 2015 a meeting of the Board of Directors of Anthem Biosciences Limited (the Company) is scheduled to be held on Thursday February 05 2026 inter alia to consider and approve the Unaudited Standalone and Consolidated Financial Results for the quarter and nine months ended December 31 2025.

data.caption: Listing of Equity Shares of Anthem Biosciences Ltd
data.news_body: Trading Members of the Exchange are hereby informed that effective from July 21 2025 the equity shares of Anthem Biosciences Ltd (Scrip Code: 544449) are listed and admitted to dealings on the Exchange in the list of B Group Securities. For further details please refer to the notice no. 20250718-44 dated July 18 2025.
